GeneralRep

Class GeneralRepInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeneralRep.GeneralRepInformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GriRA

    public class GeneralRepInformation
extends java.lang.Object
implements GriRA
    Dedicated class to communicate with General Repository Information using sockets.

        Specified by:
        setNumCarWaitingPart in interface GriRA
        Parameters:
